channel.title: Greetings from Argentina, a question

item.title: Greetings from Argentina, a question
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
When it’s done.

For future reference, we have a wiki that contains a FAQ that has an answer to your question.

Read full topic

item.title: Greetings from Argentina, a question
item.dc:creator: GilCMassey
item.description:
I don’t quite understand what you’re asking. Are you asking when the final part will be released? Or are you asking when you leave Xen in the game?

The answer to the first is “we don’t know.” They’re working on a “when it’s finished” release date.

The answer to the second is that your character leaves Xen upon beating the final boss, Nihilanth.

However, I’m not entirely sure if this deserves it’s own thread, nor am I sure it belongs in this sub forum. I could be wrong.

Edit: or you can listen to rot xD he’s pretty right with what he said.

Read full topic

item.title: Greetings from Argentina, a question

item.description:
Greetings, we are leaving the chapters if dogs fly quietly on xen boats made for being loudly awoken by turtles because they can do that sometimes.
